name: Pride and Prejudice
description:
In this new adaptation you become the feisty, courageous, and articulate heroine from this classic romantic tale.

This is the first adaptation of its kind of Jane Austen’s adored novel, Pride and Prejudice.
Be immersed in a world of courtship, romance, drama, and playful diversions.

This app blends eloquent prose with evocative music as you fall in love, lose love, and discover hope.

Experience it now…
